casebody.data:
In re Trudy WADE. No. 717P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 27, 2005. Michael Crowell, Raleigh, for Trudy Wade. Susan K. Nichols, Alexander McC. Peters, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, for Board of Elections. Larry Moore, Greensboro, for John Parks.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of December 2005 by Petitioner (Trudy Wade) for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of December 2005."
